about.name: Kris
about.title: Hi! I'm Kris
about.description: I'm a developer who loves figuring out how things work under the hood and making them look cool on screen. Systems and graphics programming are my main playgrounds, but I hop into web dev when needed and enjoy connecting all the pieces into something that just feels right.
about.secondaryDescription: When I'm not debugging code or optimizing performance, you'll find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open source projects, or sharing my knowledge with the developer community.

currentFocus.title: Currently Working On
currentFocus.description: Building high-performance applications and contributing to the developer ecosystem.

projects.title: C++ Ray Tracer
projects.description: A basic ray tracer built in C++, capable of rendering spheres with shadows, reflections, and diffuse lighting.

projects.title: effects-rs
projects.description: A GPU-accelerated image effects tool powered by wgpu. It lets apply effects written in WGSL or SPIR-V to an image.

projects.title: CPP OpenGL Renderer
projects.description: A 3D rendering engine in C++ using OpenGL, featuring basic lighting, shaders, and camera controls.

projects.title: Crimbo Bot
projects.description: A general purpose discord bot made in python with GPU-accelerated image processing, supporting customizable image manipulation within Discord servers.

projects.title: Go BitTorrent Client
projects.description: A BitTorrent client written in Go, implementing the protocol from scratch with support for peer discovery and file downloading.

projects.title: Nes-rs
projects.description: A NES emulator written in Rust. It (will) include CPU, PPU, and APU emulation, with support for classic NES ROMs.

projects.title: Rust Web Server
projects.description: A lightweight multithreaded HTTP web server written in Rust, built for learning systems-level and network programming.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio
projects.description: My developer portfolio built with React, Vite, and Tailwind CSS, featuring smooth animations, custom UI components, and a clean structure for easy customization.
